name: Register a block for a post type

content.html:
.wp-block-code {
	border: 0;
	padding: 0;
}

.wp-block-code > div {
	overflow: auto;
}

.shcb-language {
	border: 0;
	clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
	-webkit-clip-path: inset(50%);
	clip-path: inset(50%);
	height: 1px;
	margin: -1px;
	overflow: hidden;
	padding: 0;
	position: absolute;
	width: 1px;
	word-wrap: normal;
	word-break: normal;
}

.hljs {
	box-sizing: border-box;
}

.hljs.shcb-code-table {
	display: table;
	width: 100%;
}

.hljs.shcb-code-table > .shcb-loc {
	color: inherit;
	display: table-row;
	width: 100%;
}

.hljs.shcb-code-table .shcb-loc > span {
	display: table-cell;
}

.wp-block-code code.hljs:not(.shcb-wrap-lines) {
	white-space: pre;
}

.wp-block-code code.hljs.shcb-wrap-lines {
	white-space: pre-wrap;
}

.hljs.shcb-line-numbers {
	border-spacing: 0;
	counter-reset: line;
}

.hljs.shcb-line-numbers > .shcb-loc {
	counter-increment: line;
}

.hljs.shcb-line-numbers .shcb-loc > span {
	padding-left: 0.75em;
}

.hljs.shcb-line-numbers .shcb-loc::before {
	border-right: 1px solid #ddd;
	content: counter(line);
	display: table-cell;
	padding: 0 0.75em;
	text-align: right;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
	-moz-user-select: none;
	-ms-user-select: none;
	user-select: none;
	white-space: nowrap;
	width: 1%;
}

‚Ä∫ git cd ..
WARNING: You called a Git command named 'cd', which does not exist.
Continuing in 0.1 seconds, assuming that you meant 'co'.
Updated 1 path from the index
Code language: JavaScript (javascript)

Oops. I‚Äôm so happy I only had a one word change waiting to be staged. I think this is the first time a git autocorrect has not gone in my favor.

Published Monday, Nov 21 at 20:59

Very amusing to find myself annoyed that Spotify started auto-playing a related track after the album I was listening to (Triangle, by L‚ÄôOrage) finished when I thought I had disabled that ‚Äúfeature‚Äù‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶but then also happy because I was really digging the track. üòÇ

content.html:
I haven‚Äôt deleted my Twitter account because twitter.com/jeremyfelt has been mine for over 15 years and I‚Äôm not comfortable with a bot or handle doppelg√§nger snatching it up in 30 days.

I have made my account private and I‚Äôm only visiting daily to see if anyone else has joined a Mastodon instance.

Strangely, I‚Äôve also requested credentials for a new Twitter dev account. üôÉ

I‚Äôll use that to programmatically delete all of my tweets except for the one I have pinned and my last. üé®

content.html:
I just went through a few hundred emails and clicked unsubscribe somewhere around a thousand times. The digital cleanup feels good.

Newsletters with feeds are now in my feed reader, I‚Äôll probably forget about the others soon enough. üôÇ
